flawed_nl_solution:
Grover will earn $0.5 x 20 = $<<0.5*20=10>>10 for each box.
So, he will earn $10 x 3 = $<<10*3=30>>30 after selling all the face masks.
Therefore, his total profit will be $30 - $15 = $<<30-15=51>>51.
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
